document.abstract: Something, something, something ... dark side. Something, something, something ... complete.

section.h1: An introduction to quick brown foxes and grumpy wizards
section.p: Grumpy wizards make toxic brew for the Evil Queen and Jack. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
section.h2: Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise?
section.p: I thought not. It's not a story the Jedi would teach you.
